adjective.description: Having a great many abilities or uses; versatile.
examples: I've always aspired to be an all-around entertainer

adjective.description: On or from every side or in every direction.
examples: the car features good all-around visibility

noun.description: A gymnastic event in which the scores of each individual exercise are totaled to determine the winner.
examples: Biles won world titles in all-around and floor exercise
